OCaml Labs

These are software packages developed and maintained at OCaml Labs, either directly by us or with our industrial collaborators at Citrix, Jane Street, OCamlPro, and of course with a huge amount of help from the wider OCaml community.

cryptokit

  • 1.6
  • 1.7
  • version 1.9
Maintainer contact@ocamlpro.com
Dependencies ocamlfind
Last update Dec 19, 2013
Source https://forge.ocamlcore.org/frs/download.php/1229/cryptokit-1.9.tar.gz
4432a426c9d260822f4ff2b0750413de

Cryptographic primitives library.

Cryptokit includes block ciphers (AES, DES, 3DES), stream ciphers (ARCfour), public-key crypto (RSA, DH), hashes (SHA-1, SHA-256), MACs, random number generation -- all presented with a compositional, extensible interface.

Dependencies
ocamlfind
